overview: The 37th annual Showcase of the Immortals is back in business at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida as night one will feature Sasha Banks defending her SmackDown Women's Championship against Bianca Belair, Damian Priest & Latin recording artist Bad Bunny take on The Miz & John Morrison, AJ Styles & Omos face off against The New Day for the Raw Tag Team Championships, and WWE Champion Bobby Lashley defends his title against Drew McIntyre.
title: WWE WrestleMania 37: Night 1
